column4: every time I turn my laptop on it starts one more copy of nm-applet. Today I have got up to 5!
what can I edit to stop this?
which file controls nm-applet loading at startup?
theres a config in nm-applet for that
I can't see it by clicking on the little icon... is that what you meant?
any forum will tell you not to use glxgears to benchmark your vidcard
sure.. what I meant was that it isn't outputting anything...
yeah youll always get stuff like that
